name: write_script_section
description: Write a section of the audio script to the output file. Use 'write' for the first section (creates file), 'append' for subsequent sections. Set is_final to true when the script is complete.

section_number.description: The sequential number of this script section (1, 2, 3, etc.)

operation.description: Use 'write' for the first section (creates file), 'append' for subsequent sections

script_content.description: The script content to write. Write in a conversational tone optimized for text-to-speech. Avoid abbreviations, special characters, and bullet points. Use natural transitions between topics.

is_final.description: Set to true when this is the final section and the script is complete
